entry.string: There is an error in the username
entry.translation: Zeere-a is un irrur in zee userneme

entry.string: There is a space in the username
entry.translation: Zeere-a is a spece-a in zee userneme

entry.string: That email address is already registered.
entry.translation: Thet imeeel eddress is elreedy regeestered. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: There is an error in the email address
entry.translation: Zeere-a is un irrur in zee imeeel eddress

entry.string: The two password entries are not the same
entry.translation: Zee tvu pessvurd intreees ere-a nut zee seme

entry.string: Write this string in the message body or subject to display the corresponding information
entry.translation: Vreete-a thees streeng in zee messege-a budy oor soobject tu deespley zee currespundeeng inffurmeshun

entry.string: This email will be sent to users to complete their registration by a link in the email
entry.translation: Thees imeeel veell be-a sent tu users tu cumplete-a zeeur regeestreshun by a leenk in zee imeeel

entry.string: This email will be sent to users to welcome them
entry.translation: Thees imeeel veell be-a sent tu users tu velcume-a zeem

entry.string: This email will be sent to users who use the lost password option
entry.translation: Thees imeeel veell be-a sent tu users vhu use-a zee lust pessvurd oopshun

entry.string: This email will be sent to users when their accounts are pending approval
entry.translation: Thees imeeel veell be-a sent tu users vhee zeeur eccuoonts ere-a pendeeng epprufel

entry.string: This email will be sent to users when their accounts are deactivated
entry.translation: Thees imeeel veell be-a sent tu users vhee zeeur eccuoonts ere-a deecteefeted

entry.string: The following variables will be replaced in the text with specific information
entry.translation: Zee fullooeeng fereeebles veell be-a repleced in zee text veet speceeffic inffurmeshun

entry.string: Send mail to groups, configure automatic notification or edit notification templates
entry.translation: Send meeel tu gruoops, cunffeegoore-a ootumeteec nuteefficeshun oor ideet nuteefficeshun templetes

entry.string: Search for users with either their real name, login name or email matching the string
entry.translation: Seerch fur users veet ieezeer zeeur reel neme-a, lugeen neme-a oor imeeel metcheeng zee streeng

entry.string: A new user has registered. Here are the details
entry.translation: A noo user hes regeestered. Bork bork bork! Here-a ere-a zee deteeels

entry.string: That email address is either reserved or not allowed on this website
entry.translation: Thet imeeel eddress is ieezeer reserfed oor nut ellooed oon thees vebseete

entry.string: Your password must be #(1) characters long.
entry.translation: Yuoor pessvurd moost be-a #(1) cherecters lung.
Vrung ergooments tu roles_userapi_get. Um de hur de hur de hur.
